frontmatter.title: Dropdown
frontmatter.description: Dropdowns present a list of options that can be used to filter or sort existing content. They can also be used as menus.

![Spacing for combo box dropdown](images/dropdown-style-6.png)

![Structure and spacing for a multiselect dropdown](images/dropdown-style-7.png)

![Structure and spacing for inline dropdown](images/dropdown-style-8.png)

These size options can be applied to all variants of dropdown. | Element | Size | Height px / rem | | --------- | ----------- | --------------- | | Field | Small (sm) | 32 / 2 | | | Medium (md) | 40 / 2.5 | | | Large (lg) | 48 / 3 | | Menu item | Small (sm) | 32 / 2 | | | Medium (md) | 40 / 2.5 | | | Large (lg) | 48 / 3 | ![Sizes for dropdown](images/dropdown-style-size-fixed.png) Default dropdown sizes | px / rem ### Fluid inputs There is only one input height but there are two menu item sizesâ€“default and condensed. | Element | Size | Height px / rem | | --------- | --------- | --------------- | | Field | Default | 64 / 4 | | Menu item | Default | 64 / 4 | | | Condensed | 40 / 2.5 | ![Sizes for dropdown](images/dropdown-style-size-fluid.png) Fluid dropdown sizes | px / rem
